mbean.name: dcm4chee.xds:service=XDSRegistryService
mbean.xmbean:
XDSRegistry MBeanService
Provides a XDS Registry Service for Mocking Registry Responses for XDS.a and XDS.b Requests.
This service can also send JMX Notification for received SubmitObjectRequests. The userData of the notification will therefore contain either a 'org.dcm4chee.xds.infoset.v30.SubmitObjectsRequest' or 'org.dcm4chee.xds.infoset.v21.SubmitObjectsRequest' object. org.dcm4chee.xdsb.registry.mbean.XDSbRegistryService The default constructor XDSbRegistryService Enable logging of received Request message (Provide And Register Document Set). LogReceivedMessage boolean Enable/Disable logging of received Response message (RegistryResponse). LogResponseMessage boolean Enable/disable indention of logged XML message. IndentXmlLog boolean Save Provide And Register Document Set Request as file. SaveRequestAsFile boolean Base directory where requests are stored.
Format of the file name is: <SavePath>/<SubmissionSetUID>.xml
SavePath java.lang.String An optional error message for mocked Registry Response.
Format: NONE or [<Error Code>|]<ErrorMessage>
NONE: Means Success status
ErrorCode: Optional ErrorCode. If not specified 'XDSRegistryError' is used.
ErrorMessage: The error message.
MockError java.lang.String Filename of a file which holds a AdhocQueryResponse for mocking StoredQuery response.
Use '{id}' as placeholder for the Stored Query ID (without 'urn:uuid:') to get request type specific responses.
Use NONE to use an empty response. MockQueryResponseFile java.lang.String Activates notification of registered listeners about received 'Register Document Set' request.
